data.comment: The match has started at Estadio Victoria.
Free kick Necaxa.
In the minute 5, Necaxa pushes forward through Fernando Arce, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in Necaxa.
In the minute 9, Free kick for Necaxa in the half of Puebla.
Javier Salas (Puebla) gets a yellow card.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Necaxa in their own half.
Christian Tabo (Puebla) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for Necaxa at Estadio Victoria.
Throw-in for Necaxa in their own half.
Puebla awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 16, Jorge Perez awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Necaxa in their own half.
In the minute 19, Ball safe as Puebla is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Puebla awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Aguascalientes, Maximiliano Salas of Necaxa is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 21, Necaxa's Ian Gonzalez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Puebla goal kick.
Corner awarded to Necaxa.
In the minute 23, Jorge Perez awards Puebla a goal kick.
Jorge Perez signals a Necaxa throw-in in Puebla's half.
Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
In the minute 26, In Aguascalientes Necaxa attack through Fernando Arce. The finish is off target, however.
Puebla have a goal kick.
Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
In the minute 28, Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Puebla.
Throw-in for Puebla in the half of Necaxa.
Puebla are coming forward and Christian Tabo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 32, It's a goal kick for the home team in Aguascalientes.
Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Aguascalientes to check on Nicolas Vikonis, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 38, Puebla's Nicolas Vikonis looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Puebla take a 0-1 lead thanks to Omar Fernandez.
Osvaldo Martinez with an assist there.
In the minute 42, Goal kick for Necaxa at Estadio Victoria.
Puebla have a goal kick.
Puebla awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Jorge Perez will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Necaxa.
Necaxa's Ricardo Chavez breaks free at Estadio Victoria. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Puebla at Estadio Victoria.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Estadio Victoria.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, It's a goal kick for the home team in Aguascalientes.
The home team have replaced Idekel Dominguez with Lucas Passerini. This is the first substitution made today by Luis Alfonso Sosa.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Necaxa in their own half.
Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
In the minute 47, Puebla's Christian Tabo has been booked in Aguascalientes.
Jorge Perez awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Puebla is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 49, Necaxa to take a throw-in in Puebla territory.
Jorge Perez awards Puebla a goal kick.
Alex Zendejas for Necaxa gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 50, Ball goes out of play for a Puebla goal kick.
Corner awarded to Puebla.
Puebla have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
In the minute 53, Can Necaxa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Puebla's half?
In Aguascalientes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Puebla have a goal kick.
In the minute 57, Necaxa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Puebla in their own half.
Necaxa make their second substitution with Oscar Millan replacing Claudio Baeza.
In the minute 61, Puebla awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jorge Perez waits before resuming play because Omar Fernandez for Puebla is still down.
Free kick for Puebla in their own half.
In the minute 63, Omar Fernandez for Puebla is back on the field again.
Puebla awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lucas Passerini for Necaxa has been booked by Jorge Perez and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 64, Amaury Escoto is on a sub for Christian Tabo for Puebla.
Throw-in for Necaxa at Estadio Victoria.
In the minute 65, Can Puebla get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Necaxa's half?
Nestor Vicente Vidrio is replacing Salvador Reyes for Puebla at Estadio Victoria.
Necaxa have a dangerous throw-in.
Jorge Perez signals a free kick to Puebla in their own half.
In the minute 70, Jorge Perez signals a throw-in for Puebla, close to Necaxa's area.
Goal kick for Puebla at Estadio Victoria.
Ball goes out of play for a Puebla goal kick.
In the minute 72, The home team replace Maximiliano Salas with Jose Cobian.
Juan Reynoso is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Victoria with Daniel Alvarez replacing Osvaldo Martinez.
The away team has substituted Omar Fernandez with Santiago Ormeno. Juan Reynoso is thus making his fourth change.
In the minute 74, Puebla awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Aguascalientes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Santiago Ormeno for Puebla gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 76, Jorge Perez awards Necaxa a goal kick.
Throw-in Puebla.
Brayan Angulo is booked for the away team.
In the minute 79, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Puebla in their own half.
Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
In the minute 80, Can Necaxa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Puebla's half?
It's a goal kick for the away team in Aguascalientes.
Jorge Perez signals a Necaxa throw-in in Puebla's half.
In the minute 81, Puebla awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Puebla close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Puebla.
In the minute 82, George Corral (Puebla) has received a first yellow card.
David Cabrera is replacing Fernando Arce for the home team.
Goal kick for Puebla at Estadio Victoria.
In the minute 85, Throw-in high up the field for Puebla in Aguascalientes.
Necaxa needs to be cautious. Puebla have an attacking throw-in.
Puebla have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
In the minute 86, Ball safe as Necaxa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Jorge Perez.
Necaxa to take a throw-in in Puebla territory.
In the minute 87, Corner awarded to Necaxa.
Corner awarded to Necaxa.
Puebla have a goal kick.
In the minute 89, Necaxa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Necaxa in Aguascalientes.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Aguascalientes.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Aguascalientes.
Free kick Necaxa.
Free kick for Puebla in the half of Necaxa.
Throw-in for Puebla at Estadio Victoria.
Throw-in for Necaxa in the half of Puebla.
Throw-in Necaxa.
Jorge Perez blows to end the match. The final score is 0-1.
The away team replace George Corral with Emanuel Gularte.
